title: Shaws out raising for Lang Walker-backed Carbonxt
text:
Shaw and Partners has launched a raising for pollution control business Cabonxt.

Carbonxt CEO Warren Murphy. Supplied

The company is seeking to raise up to $4 million via a conditional placement at 36¢, a 13.3 per cent discount to its last close of 41¢.

The equity will be used to fund working capital associated with new contract wins.

The company will also offer a capped share purchase plan of up to $1 million.

Carbonxt produces activated carbons that are used to eliminate mercury and other toxic pollutants. Its main business is in removing mercury from waste water and flue gas emitted from coal-fired power stations.
description: The pollution control business will use the equity to fund working capital associated with new contract wins.
